name: Rise of Empire
description:
A game inspired by Age of empire series.

Long Time Ago in the middle ages small towns where very close to each other living each day like every town ,

but one day those town wanted to expand there territories, It begins while a small land discovered filling with resources

Wood, Food and  Gold they rush to capture this land in order to expand there for a war start to rise and there will be one

Winner and an Empire to Rise.

Local multiplayer available.

campaign and story.

"RiseOfEmpire.Zip" is the source code
